summary: Jeannie Gunn faced being the only civilised woman in an uncivilised land. A story of personal triumph about one woman who reached out in a hard, hostile, prejudiced world and managed to find love.
cast: Angela Punch McGregor|Arthur Dignam|Martin Vaughan|Lewis Fitz-Gerald|John Jarratt|Tony Barry|Tommy Lewis|Donald Blitner|Mawuyul Yanthalawuy|Cecil Parkee|Sibina Willy|Tex Morton|Kim Chiu Kok|Brian Granrott|Danny Adcock|John Cameron|Jessie Roberts|Christine Conway|Ray Pattison|George Jadarku|Sally McKenzie|Sarah Craig|Fincina Hopgood|Lise Rodgers|Dayle Alison|Jenni Cunningham
title: Aventura inolvidable
